map
Class MapCell

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--map.MapCell
public class MapCell
extends java.lang.Object

Holds infomartion of a cell (a rawTile).

The difference between a rawTile and a cell is that for example there exist1 10 pieces water as rawTiles, representing how to draw it, but every every block in the ocean has 64 water cells.

Hope I explained it cleary, maybe there is a better way... - knoxos

A streched tile: 

   stl ... stretch left  side
    hl ... height left side
         
      -/-------/---------------- ** --------------/---------/-
       |       |                *|  *.            |         |
       |       |               * |    *.          | str     |
       |       |              *  |      *.        |         |
       |       |             *   |        * ------/         |         
       |   stl |            *    |        *                 |
       |       |           *     |       *                  |
    hl |       |          *      |      *                   | hr
       |       |         *       |     *                    |
       |       |        *        |    *                     | 
       |      -/------- *.       |   *                      |      str ... stretch right side
       |                  *.     |  *                       |      hr  ... height right
       |                    *.   | *                        |
       |                      *. |*                         |
      -|----------------------- **--------------------------/-
                                     | 
                                     V 
                                 middle line

See Also:
from ScreenRenderer
